thread.title: Emirati-Korean Friendship Society marks Zayed Humanitarian Work Day
thread.title_full: Emirati-Korean Friendship Society marks Zayed Humanitarian Work Day | MENAFN.COM

author: Emirates News Agency (WAM)
title: Emirati-Korean Friendship Society marks Zayed Humanitarian Work Day
text:
(MENAFN - Emirates News Agency (WAM)) The Emirati-Korean Friendship Society last night organised the annual celebration of the Zayed Humanitarian Work Day in Abu Dhabi, to coincide with the anniversary of the death of the late Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan.

The ceremony, which was hosted by the Zayed Centre for Studies and Research, included an Iftar banquet which was attended by officials from the South Korean Embassy in the country, businessmen, and members of the Korean community.

Humaid Abdullah Al Hammadi, Chairman of the Board of Directors of the society, said that the annual programme aims to contribute to strengthening the Zayed Humanitarian Work Day initiative, highlight the importance of supporting different communities, and develop a culture of charity giving in future generations.

Al Hammadi praised the bonds of friendship and cooperation that the UAE and South Korea and both their peoples share in all fields, under the wise leadership of President His Highness Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan.
